course.subject: LANG
course.name: Effective Chinese Communication
course.description: This course seeks to enhance the market competitiveness of HKUST graduates by making them effective users of spoken Putonghua and Standard Written Chinese in meeting communicative needs in academic, social and professional contexts. The course materials and activities help students acquire fluency and accuracy in the use of Chinese by engaging them in authentic communication tasks based  on  real-life situations and needs. Students’ mastery of Putonghua phonology and Chinese syntax and lexis will also be enhanced through in-class teaching and outside class practice.
course.exclusions: LANG 1421, LANG 1422, LANG 1423, LANG 1424

reviews.author: Michael504
reviews.comment_content:
attendance計分
有時instructor會叫你翻去睇下篇文，然後下堂會問你
reviews.comment_teaching: instructor其實幾友善而且都教得唔錯
reviews.comment_grading: 其實都grade得唔錯，只要你有比少少心機落去就起碼B range
reviews.comment_workload:
成個sem 4份功課+2個細quiz
2份寫作 1份時事論壇（group discussion） 1份group presentation

-寫作還好，類似dse寫作 1份group presentation反思 1份評論
-group presentation要花比較多心機去整PowerPoint+背稿
-時事論壇就一定要同組員夾時間練一練，如果唔係dead air就尷尬，完左之後仲會有個觀眾問答環節，如果你答得好可能會加分

overall以dse中文lv3去上呢個course其實唔難，只不過D presentation要準備得比較多時間
